cyclone.name: DORIAN
cyclone.current_location: about 70 mi SSE of Charleston, South Carolina
cyclone.trajectory: moving north-northeast, forecast to turn northeast and accelerate along the U.S. Mid-Atlantic coast toward Nova Scotia

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical-storm watches posted from north of Chincoteague, VA to Fenwick Island, DE and portions of Chesapeake Bay and coastal Massachusetts
weather_observation.warning_coast: Hurricane warnings Savannah River, SC to NC/VA border; tropical-storm warnings north to Chincoteague, VA
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Coasts of Georgia, South Carolina, North Carolina and the Mid-Atlantic northward toward New England
weather_observation.wind: No significant tropical-cyclone winds expected at PortMiami
